participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Caring and compassionate, Emily tends to be a bit self-conscious about her appearance but is very dedicated to her love for animals.
participant_1.background: I have trouble losing weight. I do not cook and usually eat out. I am near sighted and wear contact lenses. I am a very short woman. I love animals.

participant_2.name: David
participant_2.personality: Creative and practical, David enjoys expressing himself through art while also valuing the stability of his financial situation.
participant_2.background: I drive a four wheel drive vehicle. My house is paid for. I wear a uniform to work. I like to draw and paint in my spare time. My favorite color is blue.
